articles.author: Edd Straw
articles.title: Briatore return erodes final bit of Renault's F1 credibility - The Race
articles.description: Renault bringing the architect of the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix scandal back to its Formula 1 team erodes the final bit of the outfit's credibility, says Edd Straw
articles.content: Renaults Formula 1 strategy has always been puzzling. At times half-hearted, only sporadically as successful as it should be and always unstable, the appointment of Flavio Briatore as executive advis… [+4058 chars]
